name: OR control input
Order Catalog Sync
func:
var cookie = msg.payload.session;

var output = {
    "root":{
        "SEARCH":{
            "$":{
                "catalog_synonym_primary":msg.payload.code,
                "effective_status_primary":"Y",
                "catalog_synonym_directCare":"",
                "effective_status_directCare":"",
                "catalog_synonym_ancillaryDept":"",
                "effective_status_ancillaryDept":"",
                "qty_reqd_yn":"",
                "freq_applicable_yn":"",
                "soft_stop_yn":"",
                "cont_order_yn":"",
                "contineous_freq_order":"",
                "priority_appl":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_yn":"",
                "routine_chk_for_dupl_yn":"",
                "urgent_chk_for_dupl_yn":"",
                "stat_chk_for_dupl_yn":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_status":"",
                "check_for_dupl_level":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_behind_action":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_behind_period":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_behind_unit":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_ahead_action":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_ahead_period":"",
                "chk_for_dupl_ahead_unit":"",
                "dup_reason_reqd_yn":"",
                "consent_reqd_yn":"",
                "consent_form_list":"F",
                "consent_stage":"A",
                "multiple_consent_yn":"",
                "num_of_consent_req_bo":"0",
                "num_of_consent_req_br":"0",
                "consent_form_id":"",
                "refusal_form_id":"",
                "explanatory_text":"",
                "dept_only_yn":"",
                "complete_on_order_yn":"",
                "bill_yn":"",
                "result_applicable_yn":"Y",
                "auto_report_yn":"",
                "confidential_yn":"",
                "result_auth_reqd_yn":"",
                "order_catalog_nature":"A",
                "chart_result_type":"",
                "proc_coding_scheme":"",
                "discr_msr_panel_id_desc":"",
                "discr_msr_panel_id":"",
                "appl_button":"?",
                "contr_mod_id":"",
                "contr_msr_panel_desc":"",
                "contr_msr_panel_id":"",
                "ChartProceApplicable":"Y",
                "proc_link_applicable":"X",
                "proc_link_resulting_option":"M",
                "term_set_id":"",
                "term_code":"",
                "term_desc":"",
                "term_code_button":"?",
                "temp_term_desc":"",
                "notes_sql":"select note_type code,note_type_desc description from ca_note_type where eff_Status = 'E' and upper(note_type) like upper(?) and upper(note_type_desc) like upper(?)  and note_group_id in (SELECT NOTE_GROUP FROM CA_NOTE_GROUP WHERE APPL_TASK_ID='RESULT_REPORTING') ",
                "sql_or_catalog_discrete_auto_report_yn":"SELECT DISCR_MSR_ID code, SHORT_dESC description FROM AM_DISCR_MSR WHERE RESULT_TYPE ='H' AND EFF_sTATUS = 'E' and upper(discr_msr_id) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) ORDER BY 2 ",
                "sql_or_catalog_discrete_profile":"select discr_msr_id code,short_Desc description from am_discr_msr where eff_Status ='E' and result_type ='Z' and upper(discr_msr_id) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) order by 2",
                "sql_or_catalog_culture_test_atomic":"select discr_msr_id code,short_Desc description from am_discr_msr where eff_Status ='E' and result_type in('F')and upper(discr_msr_id) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) order by 2",
                "ResultTemplate_sql":"select  result_temp_id code ,result_temp_desc description from or_result_template_editor where result_temp_id like ? and result_temp_desc like ? order by 2",
                "ResultMatrix_sql":"select chart_result_type code,chart_result_type_desc description from or_chart_result_type where chart_result_type like ? and chart_result_type_desc like ? order by 2",
                "sql_or_catalog_discrete_atomic":"select discr_msr_id code,short_Desc description from am_discr_msr where eff_Status ='E' and result_type not in('V','Z','H','P','A','R','S','X')and upper(discr_msr_id) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) order by 2",
                "mode":"1",
                "localeName":"en",
                "bean_id":"Or_OrderCatalog",
                "bean_name":"eOR.OrderCatalogBean",
                "qry_str":"mode=1&function_id=OR_ORDER_MASTER&menu_id=CIS&module_id=OR&function_id=OR_ORDER_MASTER&function_name=Order%20Catalog&function_type=F&access=YYYNN&tabFlag=C&order_category="+msg.payload.ordercate+"&order_type_code="+msg.payload.ordertype,
                "bill_install_Yn":"Y",
                "order_category":msg.payload.ordercate,
                "result_applicable_yn_db":"Y",
                "tabType":"C",
                "qty_uom_sql":"select uom_code code,short_Desc description from AM_UOM where eff_Status = 'E' and upper(uom_code) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) order by 2  ",
                "chart_sql":"select chart_id code,short_desc description from ca_chart where  upper(chart_id) like upper(?) and upper(short_desc) like upper(?) and eff_status='E' order by 2",
                "update_soft_stop_yn_db":"N",
                "update_cont_order_yn_db":"N"
            }
        }
    }
}
msg.payload = output;
msg.headers = {
    "Accept":"*/*",
    "Content-type":"text/xml; charset=UTF-8",
    "Referer":"http://20.194.59.136:7777/HIS/eOR/jsp/OROrderCatalog.jsp?menu_id=CIS&module_id=OR&function_id=OR_ORDER_MASTER&function_name=Order%20Catalog&function_type=F&access=YYYNN",
    "Accept-Language":"en-us",
    "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate",
    "User-Agent":"Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; Trident/8.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)",
    "Host":"20.194.59.136:7777",
    "Connection":"Keep-Alive",
    "Pragma":"no-cache"
};
msg.cookies = {
    "name":"JSESSIONID",
    "session": {
        "value": cookie
    }
};
return msg;
